item.title: Need help with no ip (((( PLZ READ ))
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Well make sure that you signed in on your account you made on No-ip when the icon is on on your desktop toolbar. Sign in and then the ip you made should come up. Then make sure you have the right portfowarding, so make sure the name is RSPS and the Port is 43594 and your IP address and ENABLE it.

Read full topic
